document_data.name: ''Gloves of Lightning''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Gloves of lightning''''' were pairs of [[Item enchantment|enchanted]], ornate [[glove]]s unique to the [[Old Empires]] region.
document_data.Description: These gloves were made of a flexible leather and covered with small [[copper]] rivets.
document_data.Powers:
When wearing both gloves, a wielder was able to fire powerful bursts of electricity from their fingers three times per day. This electricity shot out to a range of {{SI|30|ft|long=yes}} This was especially dangerous against those who wore metal armor.

To activate this effect, the gloves could not be worn alongside [[gauntlet]]s.
